safetyTips: Doorstep deliveries, no contact. Hand sanitiser gel used before and after each drop off.
name: BEAUTY TREATS
description: I am a Beauty Therapist, offering a variety of treatments. I am a Crown Salon for Guinot as well as a stockist for Spa Find & Dead Sea Magik and Pro. Neom Organics, Advanced Nutrition Programme, HD Brows, LVL Lashes and Fake Bake. Currently I am offering deliveries to doorsteps with products. I have a large range, so happy to still give skincare advice and find the correct products for you. I can also offer gift vouchers and organise gifts for a special occasion. From hand & body wash and lotions to moisturisers and cleansers. Beautiful organic candles and room diffusers to organic body butters and pillow mists. Contact me via phone or email for more information. Available for Delivery or Collection.
